mapper.select: SELECT bg.id, bg.gmt_create, bg.gmt_modify, bg.grade, bg.rate, bg.ruler FROM b_official_grade bg INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX( b_official_grade.gmt_create ) AS newdate FROM b_official_grade GROUP BY b_official_grade.grade ) AS b ON bg.gmt_create = b.newdate GROUP BY bg.grade;

SELECT bg.id, bg.gmt_create, bg.gmt_modify, bg.grade, bg.rate, bg.ruler FROM b_official_grade bg INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX( b_official_grade.gmt_create ) AS newdate FROM b_official_grade GROUP BY b_official_grade.grade ) AS b ON bg.gmt_create = b.newdate GROUP BY bg.grade HAVING bg.grade=#{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_official_grade ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, grade, rate, ruler ) VALUES( NOW(), NOW(), #{grade}, #{rate}, #{ruler});
